content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: AGETXT
      operator: non_empty
    - name: AGETXT
      operator: not_matches_regex
      value: ^[0-9]+-[0-9]+$
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.102
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: AGETXT must be in number dash number format
Outcome:
  Message: AGETXT must be in number dash number format
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
    - AGETXT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '102'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: AGETXT is used to present the age range in situations
                  where the exact birthdate is not known.  It should be presented
                  in number-number format..
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: AGETXT must be in number dash number format

Outcome.Message: AGETXT must be in number dash number format

Citations.Cited_Guidance: AGETXT is used to present the age range in situations where the exact birthdate is not known.  It should be presented in number-number format..
